definitions.title: demonstr. pron. pl.
definitions.body: these (Nab. [[אלה]] (Lzb:264 Cooke:241), Cappad. and Eg. Aram. [[אלה]] (Lzb:Eph. i. 323 RES:361 A 3 S-C Pap. E.13, K 13): prob. therefore not, as used to be supposed, a Hebraism, but a peculiarity of the dialects of Je 10:11 and of Ezr (in which the usu. Aram. form [[אִלֵּין]] does not occur) : v. further [[אִלֵּין]]);—these, Je 10:11, Ezr 5:15 Kt.
